formalpara.title: Figure 1:
formalpara.para: Anatomy of the pharynx. A. Simplified generic cross-section through the pharynx, showing the geometric relationships between muscle cells, marginal cells, and the pharyngeal lumen. B. Side view of the pharynx, showing the main functional regions. Adapted, with permission, from Avery and Horvitz (1989), and Raizen and Avery (1994).
